reviewText: i ordered this but couldn't play it because it was region two and i am not. would have like it i am sure since i love michael ball. will sell the item on my daughters site because i hate returning things.

reviewText: I own this on VHS and  I think it's the best concert he's done. Everything he does is FANTASTIC. I would love to order it but I notice it says  PAL and still says it will play all regions. Will it play on my system here in the USA. The bonus featuring Ball singing four songs with a small trio is priceless.Hoping someone answers my question so I can purchase it. Thanks.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Michael is his usual high energy, approachable self.  The voice is magnificent -- but then, isn't it always?  His choice of music and his obvious comfort level with the audience all culminates in a concert to watch again and again.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was fooled by the fact that the cover said DVD and I did not see that it was for Euope only  Be aware of this fact it is for Region one not for the US

reviewText: THIS DISC IS NOT MARKED CORRECTLY WILL NOT PLAY ON U. S. SYSTEMS ONLY FOR PAL PLAYERS AND IT IS NOT IN THE DESCRIPTION.  AMAZON NEEDS TO FIX THIS AND I'M RETURNING MINE.  I LOVE HIM AND WISH THEY WOULD BE SMART ENOUGH TO LET US SEE HIS CONCERTS.
summary: NOT MARKED PAL AND IT WON'T PLAY ON U. S. SYSTEMS
